subject: Domestic Violence
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Charges have been dismissed against the W.N.B.A. All-Star Glory Johnson in a domestic violence case in Arizona involving her then-fiancée, Brittney Griner.
snippet: Charges have been dismissed against the W.N.B.A. All-Star Glory Johnson in a domestic violence case in Arizona involving her then-fiancée, Brittney Griner.
